title: Leaderboard tab behaves appropriately when selected/deselected in tab bar
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
custom_steps: When we tap the Leaderboard tab
custom_expected:
Then the Leaderboard tab will depress to show that it has been selected
And when a different tab is selected the Leaderboard tab will not stay depressed

title: Leaderboard tab icon appears in both retina and non-retina
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
custom_steps: When we view the Leaderboard tab
custom_expected: Then it appears correctly on both retina and non-retina devices

title: Initial Launch of Leaderboard tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have progressed passed the initial login screen
custom_steps: WHEN we tap the Leaderboard tab
custom_expected:
THEN the user should be taken to the Leaderboard screen containing the following tabs:
> Overall
> Daily
> Friends

title: Row information appears correctly
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And we tap the Leaderboard tab
And the Overall filter is loaded
custom_steps: When the user views the rows of leaders
custom_expected:
Then each row should display the user's avatar
And the user' rank number
And the username
And the user' record Wins
And the user's points
And the text/images appear correctly within the cell

title: Filter loads the correct amount of leaders
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And we tap the Leaderboard tab
And the Overall filter is loaded
custom_steps: When the user views the rows of leaders
custom_expected: Then the overall leader list should show a list of 25 overall leaders (not including the user's record)

title: Overall leaders appear in the correct order based on the user records
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And we tap the Leaderboard tab
And the Overall filter is loaded
custom_steps: When the user views the rows of leaders
custom_expected:
Then the leaders should appear in descending order by Wins
And the leaders should then be in descending order by Points

title: Overall leader row (not the users)
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And we tap the Leaderboard tab
And the Overall filter is loaded
custom_steps:
When the user views the rows of leaders
And taps the row of a leader (that is not the user)
custom_expected:
Then the player's User Profile page will load
And the information will match that of the player's row that was tapped

title: Users record does not appear above the Top 25 leaders on Overall filter when the user does not have a record
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And we tap the Leaderboard tab
And the Overall filter is loaded
And the user has no Win-Loss record (new user)
custom_steps: When the user views the rows of leaders
custom_expected:
Then the list of 25 leaders should start with the user ranked #1
And we should see the user's avatar
And we should see the user's rank number
And we should see the username
And we should see the user's record Wins
And we should see the user's points

title: Users record appears above the Top 25 leaders on Overall filter when the user has a record
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And we tap the Leaderboard tab
And the Overall filter is loaded
And the user has a Win-Loss record
custom_steps: When the user views the rows of leaders
custom_expected:
Then the cell above the list of 25 leaders should be the record of the user that is logged in
And we should see the user's avatar
And we should see the user's rank number
And we should see the username
And we should see the user's record Wins
And we should see the user's points

title: User taps their own record row
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And we tap the Leaderboard tab
And the Overall filter is loaded
custom_steps:
When the user views the rows of leaders
And taps the row of their own record (from within top 25)
custom_expected:
Then the user's User Profile page will load
And the information will match that of the player's row that was tapped

title: Logged in user is ranked among the Top 25 overall leaders
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And we tap the Leaderboard tab
And the overall filter is loaded
custom_steps:
When the user views the rows of leaders
And the user's name is ranked within the list of leaders
custom_expected:
Then the user's information will appear in the list of ranked leaders
And the rank will appear correctly based on the user's record/points

title: User's friend appears ranked among the Top 25 leaders
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And we tap the Leaderboard tab
And the overall filter is loaded
And the user has previously connected to Facebook
custom_steps:
When the user views the rows of leaders
And the user's friend's name is ranked within the list of leaders
custom_expected:
Then the friend's information will appear in the list of ranked leaders
And the rank will appear correctly based on the user's record/points

title: User's name appears in Overall Leaderboard when Facebook Connected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have progressed past the initial login screen
AND we have chosen the option to Facebook Connect
AND the user has a Win-Loss record
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap the Leaderboard tab
AND the Overall filter is loaded
custom_expected:
THEN the user's bamnet nickname will be replaced with their Facebook name
AND the user's avatar will be replaced with their Facebook Profile picture

title: User that has previously connected to Facebook taps Friends filter on Leaderboard tab
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And we tap the Leaderboard tab
And the Overall filter is loaded
And the user has previously connected to Facebook
custom_steps: When the user taps on the Friend filter
custom_expected:
Then the list will display the rank of all the user's Facebook friends that are playing Head to Head Challenge and have connected to Facebook
And the list will be sorted descending by record and points
And the list will show +/- 50 users depending on the amount of Facebook friends that have played Head to Head challenge
And the list will scroll to accommodate for the entire list of friends

title: Friend Leader row information appears correctly
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And we tap the Leaderboard tab
And we have previously connected to Facebook
And the Friend filter is loaded
custom_steps: When the user views the rows of leaders
custom_expected:
Then each row should display the friend's avatar
And the friend's rank number
And the username
And the friend's record Wins
And the friend's points
And the text/images appear correctly within the cell

title: User that has previously connected to Facebook has less than 25 Friends that have played Head to Head
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And we tap the Leaderboard tab
And we have previously connected to Facebook
And the Friend filter is loaded
custom_steps:
When the user views the rows of leaders
And the user has less than 25 friends playing Head to Head
custom_expected:
Then the list of friends should accurately reflect the number of Facebook friends that have played Head to Head
And the list should not scroll unless necessary

title: User that has previously connected to Facebook has more than 25 Friends that have played Head to Head
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And we tap the Leaderboard tab
And we have previously connected to Facebook
And the Friend filter is loaded
custom_steps:
When the user views the rows of leaders
And the user has more than 25 friends playing Head to Head
custom_expected:
Then the list of friends should accurately reflect the number of Facebook friends that have played Head to Head
And the list should scroll so that all friends rows can be viewed

title: Users record appears above the leaders on Friends filter
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And we tap the Leaderboard tab
And we have previously connected to Facebook
And the Friends filter is loaded
custom_steps: When the user views the rows of friends
custom_expected:
Then the cell above the list of friends should be the record of the user that is logged in
And we should see the user's avatar
And we should see the user's rank number
And we should see the username
And we should see the user's wins
And we should see the user's points

title: User taps a friend's leader row (not the users)
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And we tap the Leaderboard tab
And the user has previously connected to Facebook
And the friend filter is loaded
custom_steps:
When the user views the rows of friends
And taps the row of a friend (that is not the user)
custom_expected:
Then the friend's User Profile page will load
And the information will match that of the player's row that was tapped

title: User taps their own record row
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And we tap the Leaderboard tab
And the user has previously connected to Facebook
And the friend filter is loaded
custom_steps:
When the user views the rows of friends
And taps the row of their own record
custom_expected:
Then the user's User Profile page will load
And the information will match that of the player's row that was tapped

title: Logged in user is ranked among the Friends leaders
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And we tap the Leaderboard tab
And the user has previously connected to Facebook
And the friend filter is loaded
custom_steps:
When the user views the rows of friends
And the user's name is ranked within the list of friends
custom_expected:
Then the user's information will appear in the list of ranked friends
And the rank will appear correctly based on the user's record/points

title: User that has not connected to Facebook taps Friends filter on Leaderboard tab
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And we tap the Leaderboard tab
And the Overall filter is loaded
And the user has not previously connected to Facebook
custom_steps: When the user taps on the Friend filter
custom_expected:
Then the user will be prompted with messaging saying that the leaderboard is not available until you connect to Facebook
And a button to "Facebook Connect" will be listed below said messaging

title: User that has previously connected to Facebook and logged out of Facebook taps Friends filter on Leaderboard tab
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And the user has previously connected to Facebook
But the user has disconnected their Facebook account
And we tap the Leaderboard tab
And the Overall filter is loaded
custom_steps: When the user taps on the Friend filter from the Leaderboard tab
custom_expected:
Then the user will be prompted with messaging saying that the leaderboard is not available until you connect to Facebook
And a button to "Facebook Connect" will be listed below said messaging

title: User that has not previously connected to Facebook successfully connects through flow in the friends filter of the Leadership tab
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And we tap the Leaderboard tab
And the Overall filter is loaded
And the user has not previously connected to Facebook
And the user taps on the Friend filter
custom_steps:
When the user is prompted with messaging saying that the leaderboard is not available until you connect to Facebook
And a button to "Facebook Connect" will be listed below said messaging
And the user taps on the "Facebook Connect"
And the user connects their Facebook account
custom_expected:
Then upon successful Facebook connect, the Friends leaderboard will populate with the ranking of the user's Facebook friends that have downloaded the Head to Head Challenge app
And the friend's list will populate in descending order by record ranking

title: Launch Leaderboard tab when there is no connectivity
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And the device has lost connectivity
custom_steps: When we tap the Leaderboard tab
custom_expected: Then we should see a proper error message letting the user know that the data cannot be loaded

title: User accesses Daily Leaderboard before 5pm
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has selected the Daily Leaderboard
AND that the season isn't over
AND the time is before 5 PM EST
custom_steps: WHEN the user looks at the Daily Leaderboard Date
custom_expected: THEN the Daily Leaderboard will display the previous day's information

title: Daily Leaderboard flips to the next day at 5 PM EST as long as the season isn't over
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has selected the Daily Leaderboard
AND that the season isn't over
AND the time is before 5 PM EST
custom_steps: When the time hits 10 AM EST
custom_expected: THEN the Daily Leaderboard will flip to the next day (Today)

title: Daily Leaderboard is loaded for a day that has not challenges
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have progressed past the initial login screen
AND we tap the Leaderboard tab
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the Daily tab
AND no Challenges have been scored on the selected date
custom_expected:
Then a message will display in the Daily Leaderboard:
> There are no scored challenges for this date.

title: Daily Leader row information
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have progressed past the initial login screen
AND we tap the Leaderboard tab
AND the Daily tab is loaded
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the rows of leaders
custom_expected:
THEN each row should display the user's avatar
AND the user' rank number
AND the username
AND the user' record Wins
AND the user's points
AND the text/images appear correctly within the cell

title: Daily Leaderboard filter loads the correct amount of leaders
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have progressed past the initial login screen
AND we tap the Leaderboard tab
AND the Daily filter is loaded
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the rows of leaders
custom_expected: THEN the Daily leader list should show a list of 25 overall leaders (not including the user's record)

title: Daily leaders appear in the correct order based on the user records from the Day
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have progressed past the initial login screen
AND we tap the Leaderboard tab
AND the Daily filter is loaded
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the rows of leaders
custom_expected:
THEN the leaders should appear in descending order by Wins for the given day selected
AND the leaders should then be in descending order by Points

title: User taps an Daily leader row (not the user's)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have progressed past the initial login screen
AND we tap the Leaderboard tab
AND the Daily filter is loaded
custom_steps:
WHEN the user views the rows of leaders
AND taps the row of a leader (that is not the user)
custom_expected:
THEN the player's User Profile page will load
AND the information will match that of the player's row that was tapped

custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And we tap the Leaderboard tab
And the Daily filter is loaded
And the user has no Win-Loss record (new user)
custom_steps: When the user views the rows of leaders
custom_expected:
Then the list of 25 leaders should start with the user ranked #1
And we should see the user's avatar
And we should see the user's rank number
And we should see the username
And we should see the user's record Wins
And we should see the user's points

custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And we tap the Leaderboard tab
And the Daily filter is loaded
And the user has a Win-Loss record
custom_steps: When the user views the rows of leaders
custom_expected:
Then the cell above the list of 25 leaders should be the record of the user that is logged in
And we should see the user's avatar
And we should see the user's rank number
And we should see the username
And we should see the user's record Wins
And we should see the user's points

custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And we tap the Leaderboard tab
And the Daily filter is loaded
custom_steps:
When the user views the rows of leaders
And taps the row of their own record (from within top 25)
custom_expected:
Then the user's User Profile page will load
And the information will match that of the player's row that was tapped

title: Logged in user is ranked among the Top 25 Daily leaders
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And we tap the Leaderboard tab
And the Daily filter is loaded
custom_steps:
When the user views the rows of leaders
And the user's name is ranked within the list of leaders
custom_expected:
Then the user's information will appear in the list of ranked leaders
And the rank will appear correctly based on the user's record/points

title: User's friend appears ranked among the Top 25 leaders
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed Head to Head
And we have progressed past the initial login screen
And we tap the Leaderboard tab
And the Daily filter is loaded
And the user has previously connected to Facebook
custom_steps:
When the user views the rows of leaders
And the user's friend's name is ranked within the list of leaders
custom_expected:
Then the friend's information will appear in the list of ranked leaders
And the rank will appear correctly based on the user's record/points

title: User's name appears in Daily Leaderboard when Facebook Connected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have progressed past the initial login screen
AND we have chosen the option to Facebook Connect
AND the user has a Win-Loss record
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap the Leaderboard tab
AND the Daily filter is loaded
custom_expected:
THEN the user's bamnet nickname will be replaced with their Facebook name
AND the user's avatar will be replaced with their Facebook Profile picture

title: Day to Day Navigation works forward and backwards
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have selected the Daily Leaderboard
AND the day we are at is not the first day season
OR the day we are at is not the last day of the season
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap the forward navigation buttons
OR we tap the backwards navigation buttons
custom_expected: THEN the Daily Leaderboard updates to the appropriate date

title: When tapping on the date then a calendar picker will appear
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user is on the Daily Leaderboard
custom_steps: When we tap on the date in the top of the Daily Leaderboard
custom_expected: Then the Calendar picker appears

title: User scrolls left and right on Calendar picker
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user has launched the Calendar picker from the Daily Leaderboard
custom_steps: When the user swipes left and right on the calendar
custom_expected: Then the calendar should flip to show the newly selected month

title: User taps forward and back arrows on calendar picker
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user has launched the Calendar picker from the Daily Leaderboard
custom_steps: When the user taps left or right on the calendar
custom_expected: Then the calendar should adjust and show the newly selected month

title: User scrolls using month scroll bar on bottom of calendar picker
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user has launched the calendar picker from the Daily Leaderboard
custom_steps: When the user scrolls left and right along the bottom scroll bar
custom_expected: Then the month selected should quickly adjust as the user slides back and forth

title: User selects a date in the Calendar
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user has launched the calendar picker
custom_steps: When the user selects a date on the calendar picker
custom_expected:
Then the calendar picker should disappear
And the user should be taken back to the Daily Leaderboard page
And the date that the user is left on should be the newly selected date

title: 'Today' button in Calendar picker
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user is on the Daily Leaderboard
And the user is on a date that is different than today's date
custom_steps:
When the user taps the Date in the top of the Daily Leaderboard
And the user taps the 'Today' button in the top of the calendar picker
custom_expected:
Then the calendar picker should disappear
And the user should be brought to the Daily Leaderboard page
And the date the user is on should be 'Todays' date

title: Date that user has selected matches date on calendar
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Daily Leaderboard
custom_steps: When the user taps the Date at the top of the Daily Leaderboard
custom_expected:
Then the calendar picker should appear
And the date that the user has selected should appear selected in the calendar picker

title: Date Navigation is bound to the appropriate season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have selected the Daily Leaderboard
AND we know the season's first and last allowed dates
custom_steps: WHEN we attempt to navigate the Daily Leaderboard beyond the allowed date ranges
custom_expected:
THEN we can't navigate earlier then the beginning of the season
AND we can't navigate past the ending of the season

title: Season end date can be extended and that we can then navigate to that new date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have configuration assistance by someone who can change it
And that person has changed the season end date
custom_steps:
WHEN we have selected the Daily Leaderboard menu
AND we attempt to navigate to the new season end date
custom_expected: THEN we can navigate to the new date that was previous inaccessible
